text: Women () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Pavel Lyubimov.Она выиграла у Софи Лорен: не стало актрисы Инны МакаровойЖЕНЩИНЫ (1965) It stars Inna Makarova, Nina Sazonova, and Nadezhda Fedosova. == Actors == * Inna Makarova as Yevdokia Kuzina * Nina Sazonova as Yekaterina Bednova * Nadezhda Fedosova as Grusha * Galina Yatskina as Alya Yagodkina * Valentina Vladimirova as Liza * Irina Murzaeva as elevator girl * Irina Martemyanova as lady at the dance == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1966 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Women (1966 movie)
